title: Ocean Fever: The Damian Foxall Story
description: High risk, extreme weather, knife-edge decisions, rivalries, and challenges in the toughest environment are all in a day's work for exceptional Irish sailor, Damian Foxall. From a remote bay in Kerry to the Southern Ocean, Damian has raced around the world eight times. Ocean Fever traces his years as a restless teenager and his successes and failures on many teams, lifting the lid on this toughest of sports. Damian Foxall spent his childhood in Derrynane in Kerry where the ocean was part of life. His journey to professional yacht racing began after time in London and the Caribbean and his first job on boats. His career covers most major trans-oceanic races, and a record set with the late Steve Fossett.
author: Damian Foxall
